T02D2521:127a-1: pra tishtha biddhi: / bod skad du /
T02D2521:127b-0: spyan dbye ba'i @127b cho ga / bcom ldan 'das
T02D2521:127b-1: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2521:127b-2: // nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing //
T02D2521:127b-3: sems can kun la phan bzhed pas /
T02D2521:127b-4: rtag tu dngos po kun bdag 'gyur //
T02D2521:127b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2521:127b-6: slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen por dbang bskur bas //
T02D2521:127b-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba /
T02D2521:127b-8: mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas /
T02D2521:127b-9: rigs lnga'i lha rnams rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2521:127b-10: de la slob dpon gyi yon tan 'di dag yin te /
T02D2521:127b-11: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D2521:127b-12: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu mod //
T02D2521:127b-13: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes /
T02D2521:127b-15: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa //
T02D2521:127b-16: 'di ni slob dpon yin zhes bya //
T02D2521:127b-17: de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams //
T02D2521:127b-19: dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin mchog / phyag rgya stang stabs gdan dang ni //
T02D2521:127b-20: bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhin mchod //
T02D2521:127b-21: las kyi sbyor ba nyer bsdu ba //
T02D2521:127b-22: de ltar de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02D2521:127b-23: dman pa'i sems ni dor ba'o //
T02D2521:127b-24: de la dang por legs par khrus byas la /
T02D2521:127b-26: gtsug tor bcings shing bcas la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa'am /
T02D2521:127b-27: yang na cha lugs ji lta bas lha'i khang par zhugs la /
T02D2521:127b-28: yo byad thams cad bsogs te /
T02D2521:127b-29: tshes grangs dang rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i dus shes par byas shing /
T02D2521:127b-30: dpal dang rgyal pa 'phel bar byed pa'i gdugs dang /
T02D2521:127b-31: rgyal mtshan dang ba dang la sogs pas gnas brgyan
T02D2521:127b-32: par byas shing sbyin bdag dang 'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2521:127b-33: la sogs pa yang brtag par bya'o //
T02D2521:127b-34: de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2521:127b-35: spos chab la rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pas gnas nye bar byug par bya'o //
T02D2521:127b-36: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2521:127b-37: aom badzra yaksha h'um de'i 'og tu dri dang sbyar ba'i chus byugs la /
T02D2521:127b-38: nang par gyi dus su rang gi rigs kyi lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyor ba'am /
T02D2521:127b-40: cho ga nyams pa mi bya ste //
T02D2521:127b-41: rab gnas rtag tu smad pa dang //
T02D2521:127b-42: tshe 'dir sdug bsngal chen po dang //
T02D2521:127b-44: de la dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02D2521:128a-1: nyid kyis ni ci nus dang //
T02D2521:128a-2: de bzhin cho gar gsungs tshul dang //
T02D2521:128a-3: kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya //
T02D2521:128a-4: de la dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs dang /
T02D2521:128a-6: gdan la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02D2521:128a-7: 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su khrus sa'i stegs bu brtsig par bya ba ni /
T02D2521:128a-8: thur bzhi pa la gru bzhi pa //
T02D2521:128a-9: dkyil 'khor gyis ni nyer mdzes pa //
T02D2521:128a-10: khru gang tsam gyi tshad du bya'o //
T02D2521:128a-11: med na legs par bri bar bya //
T02D2521:128a-12: der phyogs dang mtshams su mtshan ma la sogs bris pa'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya ste ;
T02D2521:128a-14: me tog la sogs pa phyogs dang mtshams su gzhag par bya zhing /
T02D2521:128a-15: dbus su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rigs lnga'i mtshan mas mtshan pa bzhag la /
T02D2521:128a-19: rin po che lnga bcug la /
T02D2521:128a-20: dri dang sbyar ba'i chus bkang la /
T02D2521:128a-21: ras zung gcig gis mgul ba bcings la /
T02D2521:128a-22: 'dab ma dri zhim pos kha brgyan par bya ba dang /
T02D2521:128a-23: steng du bla re bre ba dang /
T02D2521:128a-24: gos dang dril bu dbyangs pas bskor ba'i stegs bur mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2521:128a-25: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' bsams la /
T02D2521:128a-26: ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2521:128a-27: pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa dang ldan pas
T02D2521:128a-28: dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2521:128a-29: de nas aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum mam /
T02D2521:128a-30: lha de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02D2521:128a-31: de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul la /
T02D2521:128a-32: sarba p'a bam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2521:128a-34: yungs kar dang me tog gis /
T02D2521:128a-35: sems can kun la phan bde'i phyir //
T02D2521:128a-36: sbyar ba la sogs rnams bya zhing //
T02D2521:128a-37: rgyal 'gyur bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod //
T02D2521:128a-38: yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing //
T02D2521:128a-39: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D2521:128a-40: ngo mtshar ca co rnams kyang bya //
T02D2521:128a-41: las kun byed na rigs snying dang //
T02D2521:128a-42: rang gis rigs bdag gsang sngags ni //
T02D2521:128a-43: yongs bzlas sngar bshad bum pas ni //
T02D2521:128a-44: mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol lo //
T02D2521:128a-45: de nas gtsang ma'i mi rnams ni //
T02D2521:128b-0: las kun byed pa'i gsang @128b sngags kyis //
T02D2521:128b-1: bzlas byas stan ni bzang po la //
T02D2521:128b-2: rigs pa rang gnas bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2521:128b-3: de nas rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags dang /
T02D2521:128b-4: de bzhin du rigs kyi rig pa yongs su bzlas te bzhugs su gsol nas /
T02D2521:128b-5: sngags pas kyang rang gi gsang sngags dang /
T02D2521:128b-6: bskyed pa'i rim pas de rang gi gnas su sprul
T02D2521:128b-7: nas sgo dbye ba bya ste rdo rje bsdu ba
T02D2521:128b-8: bya'o // aom badzra sa m'a ya dza: dza: h'um
T02D2521:128b-9: bam ho: de nas bgegs bsal la mchod yon dbul
T02D2521:128b-10: bya'o // lo // de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2521:128b-12: gsang sngags rnams mngon par bzlas par bya ste /
T02D2521:128b-14: rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o //
T02D2521:128b-15: aom bha ga wa ti ru ru spu ru dzva
T02D2521:128b-16: la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aar tha s'a
T02D2521:128b-17: dha ne sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D2521:128b-18: rigs kyi yum gyi sngags so //
T02D2521:128b-19: aom dze na dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128b-20: zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi snying po'o //
T02D2521:128b-22: aom sham ka ri sh'intam ka ri ghu ta ni /
T02D2521:128b-23: gha ta la gha ta ya ghu ta ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128b-25: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128b-26: ka tam ka te ka ro te b'irye sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128b-27: aom a'a ro li ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128b-29: aom t'a re tu re tutt'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:128b-31: zhes bya ba ni rigs so so'i rig pa dang snying po'o //
T02D2521:128b-32: de nas cod pan dang dar dbyangs bcings pa dang /
T02D2521:128b-33: go bskon pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2521:128b-34: me tog la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la yongs su bzlas te /
T02D2521:128b-35: gus par byas la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2521:128b-37: de nas phyi rol gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2521:128b-38: dang por bgegs gzhom par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2521:128b-39: rdo rje mes sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2521:128b-40: tshim par bya ba'i phyir ni rang gi sngags kyis so //
T02D2521:128b-41: dgod par bya ba'i phyir ni rigs kyi rigs pas so //
T02D2521:128b-42: 'byor par bya ba'i don du ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying pos so //
T02D2521:128b-43: de ltar sbyin sreg byas nas /
T02D2521:128b-44: lhag par gnas par bya ba ni //
T02D2521:128b-46: / rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2521:128b-47: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2521:128b-48: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2521:128b-49: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rab gnas //
T02D2521:128b-50: mgon po bdag nyid bgyi par 'tshal //
T02D2521:128b-51: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa lags //
T02D2521:128b-52: de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs//
T02D2521:129a-0: @129a * // bdag ming rdo rje zhes bya bas //
T02D2521:129a-1: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes bya'i //
T02D2521:129a-2: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D2521:129a-3: nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D2521:129a-4: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D2521:129a-5: thugs brtse bar ni nyer gnas te //
T02D2521:129a-6: chogs pa thams cad rab gnas la //
T02D2521:129a-7: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2521:129a-9: de nas p'u dza sna tshogs kyis mchod la mngon
T02D2521:129a-10: par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba gdab
T02D2521:129a-11: par bya ste / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la /
T02D2521:129a-12: gshegs su gsol bar bya ba'i phyir 'dis bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2521:129a-13: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2521:129a-14: rjes su grub bzhin stsal lags kyis //
T02D2521:129a-15: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D2521:129a-16: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2521:129a-17: bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2521:129a-18: de la yi ge brgya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2521:129a-19: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D2521:129a-22: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2521:129a-23: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2521:129a-24: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2521:129a-26: sarba siddhimme pra ya tstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D2521:129a-27: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na sarba
T02D2521:129a-28: ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha
T02D2521:129a-29: ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:/
T02D2521:129a-30: de nas de nyid du ku sha bting la nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2521:129a-31: de nas nang par mal nas langs la de bzhin du ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2521:129a-32: spos chus gnas kun byugs la /
T02D2521:129a-34: bgegs la sogs pa bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2521:129a-35: de nas gzhal yas kyang dang gdan la sogs pa bsams la /
T02D2521:129a-36: de'i 'og tu zangs ma'i snod la sogs par mchod yon la sogs pa bshams la /
T02D2521:129a-38: de nas lha rnams dgug pa dang /
T02D2521:129a-43: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2521:129a-44: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2521:129a-45: mkhrig mar mdud pa mdzub gnyis 'dud //
T02D2521:129a-46: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2521:129a-47: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D2521:129a-48: spyan drangs la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dbul te /
T02D2521:129a-49: sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis sbyang ba byas la /
T02D2521:129b-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi @129b sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:129b-1: dbang bskur ba'i cho gas khrus gsol bar bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-2: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2521:129b-3: lha rnams kun gyis khrus gsol ba //
T02D2521:129b-4: de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chus //
T02D2521:129b-5: dag par khrus ni gsol bar bgyi //
T02D2521:129b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:129b-7: de nas na bza' dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-8: aom badzra b'a sa se sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:129b-10: aom badzra aa bha ra ni bi bhu sha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:129b-12: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um aom badzra gandhe h'um /
T02D2521:129b-14: de'i 'og tu dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-15: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02D2521:129b-16: mdzub mo rtse mo dgug pas ni //
T02D2521:129b-17: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02D2521:129b-18: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2521:129b-19: aom bhr'um kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2521:129b-20: aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2521:129b-25: aom badzra karma aa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2521:129b-26: thams cad la aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya bas
T02D2521:129b-27: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong gnyis bsnyams te bsgreng
T02D2521:129b-28: ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i'o //
T02D2521:129b-29: de las srin lag rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i'o //
T02D2521:129b-30: de nyid las gung mo gnyis padma 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma'i'o //
T02D2521:129b-31: thal mo sbyar ba bcings la gung mo dang mdzub
T02D2521:129b-32: mo dang mthe bong sbyar ba ni rdo rje las
T02D2521:129b-33: ma'i'o // de nas aom tum zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2521:129b-34: rdo rje khu tshur so sor bcings te /
T02D2521:129b-35: mdzub mo gnyis bkug la go cha bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-36: snying gar mdud pa ltar bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-39: dbral ba'i steng du mdud pa ltar bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-40: de nas phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul gyis mdud pa
T02D2521:129b-41: bya ba dang dar dbyangs bcing ba yang ngos gnyis
T02D2521:129b-42: su tha ma la sogs pa nas sor mo thams
T02D2521:129b-43: cad bkrol ba de nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes
T02D2521:129b-44: par bya ste / de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2521:129b-45: de nas sngags 'dis mig sman gyi thur mas byug ste /
T02D2521:129b-46: aom badzra tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:129b-47: de nas sngags 'dis bshos dbul te /
T02D2521:129b-48: aom d'i pya ainna sa m'a dhi dhya na sarba pri na ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2521:129b-51: bshos gzhan dag la sogs pas kyang mchod par bya ste /
T02D2521:129b-52: de ltar byas na de 'og tu yang slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2521:130a-2: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02D2521:130a-3: ji ltar gsungs bzhin rab gnas par //
T02D2521:130a-4: de ni nges byas byed du bcug / khyod kyi de ni kun rdzogs pas //
T02D2521:130a-5: ci bde bar ni shes par gyis //
T02D2521:130a-7: de nas rim pa 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2521:130a-8: thab dang dgang gzar blugs gzar rdzas //
T02D2521:130a-9: shing dang sgrub pa po dang ni //
T02D2521:130a-10: rdzas bsang dgod dang me sbyang dang //
T02D2521:130a-11: bsang gtor dang ni sbyar ba dang //
T02D2521:130a-12: ku sha dgram dang gnas khang dang //
T02D2521:130a-13: me bskyed spyan drang la sogs dang //
T02D2521:130a-14: srung skud bcings dang mchod yon dang //
T02D2521:130a-15: zhabs bsil bsgrub dang dbang bskur dang //
T02D2521:130a-16: dam tshig bsgo dang mchod yon mchod //
T02D2521:130a-18: me brtag bsang dang dgang blugs dang //
T02D2521:130a-19: kun bsregs bsang gtor gsol ba dang //
T02D2521:130a-20: thab dang me lha dgod pa dang //
T02D2521:130a-21: bsdu dang bstod dang dgug ba dang ;
T02D2521:130a-22: / sngon bzhin phyag rgya dbang bskur dang //
T02D2521:130a-24: dgang blugs cig shos las bskal dang //
T02D2521:130a-25: lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa dang //
T02D2521:130a-26: me lha dgang blugs mchod bsang dang //
